record.title: MEMORIALIZING FALLEN FIREFIGHTERS

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of Calendar No. 193, S. Res. 171.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, the motions to reconsider be laid upon the table, and any statements relating thereto be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
